alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Marion; Peach; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Macon, northeastern Marion, southeastern Upson, southwestern Peach, southwestern Crawford, southeastern Talbot and Taylor Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Howard to near Butler to Reynolds to near Hicks, and moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Butler, Marshallville, Reynolds, Junction City, Saint Louis, Whitewater State Park, Nakomis, Baldwinville, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Mauk, Howard, Lee Pope, Salem, Prattsburg, Horns, Winchester and Carsonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Macon; Marion; Peach; Talbot; Taylor; Upson
